text: William Alexander Berry (July 1882 – 1 March 1943) was an English footballer who played as a forward. Born in Sunderland, he played for Sunderland, Tottenham Hotspur, Manchester United and Stockport County. == References == ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1882 births Category:1943 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sunderland Rovers F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Tottenham Hotspur F.C. players Category:Stockport County F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Bill Berry (footballer, born 1882)
